original_text: Look! I have written your name on my own hand. I always see the walls of your city in my mind. Look! I have written your name on my own hand.
korean_text: 내가 너를 내 손바닥에 새겼고 너의 성벽이 항상 내 앞에 있나니

sentences.original_text: I have written your name on my own hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너의 이름을 내 손에 새겼다.

sentences.original_text: I always see the walls of your city
I have written your name on my own hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너의 이름을 내 손에 새겼다.
